data.text: WIZZ conquers the great Italian outdoors! 🇮🇹🏙 Following our inspiring murals and customised public bike stations in Milan, this time we've expanded our unique installations to Naples as well! Take a sneak peek at some of our hottest destinations if you happen to be around! https://t.co/BdfiImUxZb

urls.title: Wizz Europe Oct-Nov '22 Full mag
urls.description: Created with the Heyzine flipbook maker

data.text: Rollerskating has taken off across the world in the last few years, but nowhere quite like Vienna. In this issue of WIZZ magazine we get our skates on and join the trailblazers leading the way. Click on the link for the full story 👉 https://t.co/vyJWwJd8pM https://t.co/s5bYdpnDqB

data.text: @simonasbartkus @Fly_Norwegian Hi Simonas, you can find all of our destinations and schedule on the WIZZ website. You can check our best deals on the Fare Finder at the following link: https://t.co/DXBGm3hpzr.

domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Automotive, Aircraft & Boat Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to automobile, spacecraft, aircraft and boat manufacturing

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Travel & Transportation Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

data.text: @andrius_kai Hi Andrius! The issue has been escalated to our technicians and they are working on fixing it. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.
@Beasttel Hi Sanj! If you are using mobile app for check in, please use our website. Then you will be able to select your seat. Our website works best with Google Chrome as well.  Have a nice flight!

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Product
domain.description: Products created by Brands.  Examples: Ford Explorer, Apple iPhone.

domain.name: Product
domain.description: Products created by Brands.  Examples: Ford Explorer, Apple iPhone.

data.text: @RealBonio Hi! Prams and pushchairs shall be checked in with other baggage and will be carried free of charge only if the user of the equipment is travelling. However, if no infant or child is involved, these items will be carried as checked-in baggage for an additional fee. Hve a nice day!

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Travel & Transportation Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text: @akm450 Hi there! If you haven't received a refund within two weeks, please contact us via the Live Chat or Call Centre and we will check the status of your refund: https://t.co/vVE5ttZOAD.
@pjsudharshan Hi Sudharshan! As long as you make your check in online, you will not be charged at the airport. Have a nice flight!
@JenniferPanting Hi Jennifer! As long as you make your check-in online, you are not going to be charged at the airport. Have a safe flight!
@Veerdun Hi Emiliano! We are really sorry for the inconvenience. Due to the overload refunding process can take up to 30 days. Have a nice day!

data.text: Sometimes nature makes the prettiest art. A perfect example of this are the beautiful Caves of Artà in Spain. Book your tickets now, and explore this “underground museum” of nature! ! 👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF https://t.co/3jteTuGdfN

data.text: @rajagjammu Hi there! In this case you can use the airport check-in service. Or you can contact us via the Live Chat or Call Centre and we will check your issue: https://t.co/YQvBIE4ozl.

@liepija Hi there! In general, fragile, bulky, inadequately packed, late check-in and oversized baggage will only be accepted for carriage with a Limited Release baggage tag. Wizz Air cannot accept liability for such items.
@TALLBIRD10 Hi Talsy! yes, random seat selection is for free.

data.text: If you’re lucky enough to spend some time on the gorgeous island of Zakynthos, make sure to check out the Blue Caves. True, the sea looks beautiful all around the island, but here it turns into a truly special shade of blue. Book your tickets now on https://t.co/AeMNWOKuvd! https://t.co/J4iqsI5XYy
@ChrisHext Hi. Yes, you can use the return.

@nathanielarche Hi. Due to a busy summer season there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be answered and processed as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and understanding with this.

data.text: @Lulu61028636 Hi, please accept our apologies. You can request 120% WIZZ credits or a 100% original payment refund. The easiest way to request it is under your WIZZ profile. If you need further assistance please contact us via the Live Chat or Call Centre: https://t.co/4KXMx8pBhX.
